DataElement.preferredName: Computed Tomography Dose Index Volume Quantity Float
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The pitch corrected average radiation dose deposited in each slice acquired in the central plane during image acquisition (CTDIvol) for this exam, expressed in mGy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Computed Tomography Dose Index Volume Quantity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The International Electrotechnical Commission preferred expression of radiation dose in computed tomography (CT) dosimetry. It is calculated by averaging the radiation dose delivered over x,y and z directions and expressed in the SI unit of Gray (Gy)._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The International Electrotechnical Commission preferred expression of radiation dose in computed tomography (CT) dosimetry. It is calculated by averaging the radiation dose delivered over x,y and z directions and expressed in the SI unit of Gray (Gy).

Concepts.definition: The International Electrotechnical Commission preferred expression of radiation dose in computed tomography (CT) dosimetry. It is calculated by averaging the radiation dose delivered over x,y and z directions and expressed in the SI unit of Gray (Gy).

Property.preferredDefinition: Quantity; how much there is of something that you can measure.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
